about.me: Managed by Patrick Gruber, a long-time professional software engineer with a passion for backdoors and reverse engeneering. Invested in cryptos since 2017 and believes in the future for Cardano! His attitude is: 'Be the change you want to see in the world!'
about.server: Cloud infrastructure in Germany: 6 cores 16 GB RAM, SSD and runs on Linux with 400 Mbit/s and backed up with UPS. Very restrictive access and hardend extreme for the highest security! 99% Uptime!
